subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: To the coaches and players, scoring has become more difficult because the defense is too physical, coaches are choking the creativity out of offense, and players’ critical skills are deficient.
